title: Ep. - 258 - JEFFREY EPSTEIN: FILTHY RICH ON NETFLIX
description:
Time magazine reporter Mahita Gajanan helps Kate review Jeffrey Epstein: Filthy Rich, a Netflix series about convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. The miniseries is based on the 2016 book of the same name by James Patterson, and co-written by John Connolly and Tim Malloy.

 

Beth Silvers, co-host of Pantsuit Politics podcast, reviews Survivor season 40 and devises an ideal cast for a political version of the CBS show.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Facebook.com/loveandknuckles

Amazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca
